scripts.setup:audio: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const dirs=['public/audio/music','public/audio/sfx/ui','public/audio/sfx/combat','public/audio/sfx/moves','public/audio/sfx/ultimate','public/audio/sfx/feedback'];dirs.forEach(d=>fs.mkdirSync(d,{recursive:true}));fs.writeFileSync('public/audio/.gitkeep','# Add audio files here\n');console.log('âœ… Audio directories created')"
